name: holden-morris-portfolio
description: Personal portfolio website for Holden Morris

scripts.setup:icons: mkdir -p public/shoelace/assets/icons && for icon in arrow-down box-arrow-up-right building calendar3 chevron-down code-slash cpu diagram-3 envelope geo-alt github layout-text-window linkedin list server terminal; do cp node_modules/@shoelace-style/shoelace/dist/assets/icons/$icon.svg public/shoelace/assets/icons/ 2>/dev/null; done
